title: Prohibits the knowing installation, reinstallation, distribution, or sale of a previously deployed inflatable restraint system airbag
summary: Prohibits the knowing installation, reinstallation, distribution or sale of a previously deployed inflatable restraint system (airbag); violation is a class A misdemeanor; requires notice to be given when an airbag is missing in a repair or transfer transaction; prohibits overriding an airbag readiness indicator light; requires motor vehicle dealers to notify purchasers of passenger motor vehicles of the absence of an airbag.

    4    1.  "INFLATABLE  RESTRAINT SYSTEM" MEANS A DEVICE USED OR INTENDED FOR
    5  USE IN A MOTOR VEHICLE TO PROTECT THE SAFETY  OF  VEHICLE  OCCUPANTS  BY
    6  INFLATING  UPON  THE OCCURRENCE OF AN IMPACT OF THE VEHICLE WITH ANOTHER

   10    2.(A) ANY PERSON WHO KNOWINGLY INSTALLS, REINSTALLS,  DISTRIBUTES,  OR

   12  CLASS A MISDEMEANOR.

   19  TYPE,  AND  SHALL  CLEARLY STATE: "NO AIR BAG INSTALLED" OR "NO AIR BAGS
   20  INSTALLED", AND SHALL CLEARLY  INDICATE  EXACTLY  WHERE  THE  INFLATABLE
   21  RESTRAINT SYSTEM IS DESIGNED TO BE LOCATED IN THE VEHICLE.

   23  TRADES A MOTOR VEHICLE WITH A MISSING INFLATABLE RESTRAINT SYSTEM  WITH-
